## General

-   Updated the model of the Alchemy profession's crafting materials
    (*Goldpetal*, *Shrooms!*, *Blood of Helios*, and *Godsleaf*).

-   Updated the FX for when *Olympian Gemstone Fragments* are combined
    into a *Gemstone of the Olympians*.

-   *Tome of Attribute Increase +2/+3/+4/+8* objects are now dynamically
    updated to match the corresponding boss' name and level (instead of
    having unique item objects).

-   The *Resist* stat can now enter negative values and follows the same
    formula as the negative *Armor* stat:

    <blockquote>Amplification = 2 - 0.94\^(-1 \* Resist
    Value`)`{=html}.</blockquote>

-   *Enfeeble I* now reduces *Resist* by 15 for the duration (previously
    amplifies any magical damage dealth to them by 5%).

-   *Cleave* (Item Ability) FX reverted back to the default Wc3 FX.

-   *Move* is now visible on a unit's command card. (Previously, it was
    hidden.)

-   The runes for *The Fools' Mausoleum*'s crystal puzzle have their
    size increased by a factor of 1.5 and they no longer have a glow
    effect.

## Bug Fixes

-   *Ares' Blade of Might* now correctly consumes all listed forge
    components.
-   *Vengeance* (Warlock) and *Eviscerate* (Assassin) now correctly
    respects spell immunity.
-   *Soulless*' storm bolt derivative now no longer bypasses stun
    immunity checks.
-   *Frigid Aura I* and *Frigid Aura II* correctly applies to enemies
    within 450 AoE (instead of 600 AoE).
-   *Medallion of Stamina* craft correctly requires 105 crafting
    materials (instead of 80).
-   Health Regeneration and Mana Regeneration stat implemented for new
    and reworked items now works in transports and now uses the same
    clock frequency as base Health Regeneration and Mana Regeneration
    stat.
-   *Cleave* (Item Ability) now replicates the default Wc3 ability in
    bypassing Spell/Magic Immunity.
-   Replay desyncs due to the creation of custom frames should no longer
    occur \~ This does may not fix the root cause of replay desyncs, but
    it is a step towards it.
-   The disabled command buttons for *Amphirite's Cloak* and *Midnight
    Cloak* have been corrected.
